/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. Power lines crisscross above, adding a touch of urbanity to the scene. A white car is parked on the side of the road, hinting at the life and activity in the area. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the image. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. Overall, the image captures a typical day on a street in Beijing, showcasing the city's blend of natural beauty and urban development.
